TopicTitle: Planet System Ideas (MOD IDEA PLZ MAKE)

Articles.Content:
Sooo I was bored in class after a Test, so I decided to come up with a few planets for a gas giant

I would make it my self but i JUST started using Kopernicus and cant.

THE ACTUAL IDEA (all but Valieri have O2):

Valieri: a 2x Jool sized gas giant

Helia: a desert planet with little life 

Kaprika: I AM NOT RIPPING OFF CAPRICA! a radioactive kerbin esque planet with ruins of a city somwhere

Cydonia: Basically a slightly tweaked Alternis kerbol rekajjigered Laythe with a 60000 KM atmo of and can sustain life well

Autumn: a brownish colored ocean world

Tundara: an ice world with small lakes

Edited March 5, 2016 by Ogcorp CEO
